E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Mike Simms
Dear Sir,
Mike Simms is hitting the ball well at AA Harrisburg Senators!
He has an AVG of .402, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Don Schulze
Dear Sir,
Don Schulze has an ERA of 1.69 at A Salem Buccaneers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/3/1990
Subject: Progress of Ben McDonald
Dear Sir,
Ben McDonald has nothing more to prove at AA Harrisburg Senators!
He has an ERA of 1.08 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
